alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 23 at 8:19PM CDT until further notice by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Neosho River near Commerce affecting Ottawa County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neosho River near Commerce. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, moderate agricultural flooding occurs with Riverview Park experiencing minor to moderate flooding. Low lying places around Miami may be cut off from easy access. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 3.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning and continue rising to a crest of 17.8 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
